entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:52 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
